name: Anatomy by Dr. Rajesh Kaushal
description: The Anatomy App will maximize confidence and scoring in basic and advanced concepts in Anatomy and related subjects in PG Entrance Examinations, ensuring a good rank in merit list for acquiring a PG seat at the earliest possible.  Salient Features:  Human Anatomy Made Simple !  The content is prepared by the subject expert with extensive references to the Latest edition of Grays Anatomy (41 st Edition).   Theory and questions are precisely framed according to the latest pattern of examinations, examinations conducted by AIIMS, PGI Chandigarh, JIPMER, NIMHANS, AIPG (NEET) and DNB.  Simplified line diagrams, dissected specimens and Image based questions are extensively used throughout the lecture.  Equips the students to master the maximum possible content in the shortest possible time.   Covers the maximum topics being asked in the recent-pattern examinations.   High-yield topics are summarized in simplified language, at the end of each session for quick revision.   Elaborate discussion on the latest pattern questions with extensive discussion on the prospective image-based questions.  Coverage of topics in the grey area (merging boundaries between two subjects, frequently asked in the examinations but untouched by most of the faculties). Presently, interdisciplinary questions come merging Anatomy with subjects, like physiology, pathology, forensic medicine, surgery, medicine, pediatrics, OBG, ophthalmology, dermatology, radiology, and anesthesia and so on.  Reference books for the content include latest editions of Harrison Medicine, Schwartz and Sabiston Surgery, Williams Obstetrics, Williams Gynecology, Robbins Pathology, Guytons and Ganonqs Physiology, Suttons Radiology, Millers Anesthesia, Campbell Urology, CURRENT Diagnosis and Treatmentof all subjects, Scott and Brown Otorhinolaryngology, Parson and Kanskis Ophthalmology, and Apleys Orthopaedics to name a few.   Excellent handling of controversial questions with standard textbook references.
